body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Tyler Barnes and the customer's name is Diane Lee.  The conversation is about a random business (a Pawn Shop ) and is a conversation about privacy.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for calling Silver Pawn Shop. My name is Tyler Barnes, and I'm here to assist you today.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Tyler, my name is Diane Lee.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great to meet you, Diane! How can I help you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I have some concerns about the privacy of my personal information.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I completely understand your concerns. We take privacy very seriously here at Silver Pawn Shop. May I ask what specific information you are concerned about?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I just want to make sure my details are safe, especially my phone number and address.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Absolutely, I can reassure you that we encrypt all sensitive data. If you don’t mind, could you please provide your phone number, starting with the area code?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you! And could you also provide your zip code for us to ensure your information is handled correctly?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, it’s three zero one two one.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for sharing that, Diane. Your privacy is our priority, and we will make sure your details are kept confidential.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time today, Diane! If you have any further questions, don't hesitate to reach out. Have a great day!
